summary.span: 表示在 控制項中顯示的功能表項目。

span.span: Represents a menu item displayed in the control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項由階層所代表的功能表項目所組成物件。A control is made up of a hierarchy of menu items represented by objects. 每個功能表項目都有唯讀屬性，指定的層級的功能表項目會顯示在控制項。Each menu item has a read-only property that specifies the level at which the menu item is displayed in the control. 沒有父功能表項目在最上層 （層級 0） 的功能表項目稱為根功能表項目。Menu items at the top level (level 0) that do not have a parent menu item are called root menu items. 功能表項目具有父功能表項目稱為子功能表項目。A menu item that has a parent menu item is called a submenu item. 所有根功能表項目會都儲存在集合。All root menu items are stored in the collection. 子功能表項目會儲存在父功能表項目的集合。Submenu items are stored in a parent menu item's collection. 您可以使用來存取功能表項目的父功能表項目屬性。You can access a menu item's parent menu item by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 和集合包含只有上一層樓的功能表項目清單。The and collections contain only the menu items for the next level down. 若要存取功能表項目進一步功能表樹狀結構，請使用後續的功能表項目的屬性。To access menu items further down the menu tree, use the property of a subsequent menu item. 若要建立的功能表項目控制，請使用下列方法之一：To create the menu items for a control, use one of the following methods: 您可以使用宣告式語法來建立靜態功能表項目。Use declarative syntax to create static menu items. 使用建構函式動態建立的新執行個體類別。Use a constructor to dynamically create new instances of the class. 這些可以接著將物件加入至或集合。These objects can then be added to the or collection. 繫結到資料來源的控制項。Bind the control to a data source. 當控制項所繫結控制項，物件會自動建立對應至資料來源中的項目。When the control is bound to a control, objects are automatically created that correspond to the items in the data source. 其他資料來源，如物件也會自動建立符合資料來源的階層結構; 不過，您也必須使用來定義指定的繫結關聯性的功能表項目繫結的集合之間的功能表項目和其對應的資料項目。For other data sources, objects are also automatically created that match the hierarchy structure of data source; however, you must also use the collection to define the menu item bindings that specify the binding relationship between a menu item and its corresponding data item. 功能表項目會顯示在靜態功能表或動態功能表上，根據其層級。The menu items are displayed in either a static menu or a dynamic menu, depending on its level. 一律會以顯示靜態功能表控制項。The static menu is always displayed in a control. 根據預設，在最上層 （層級 0） 的功能表項目會顯示在靜態功能表中。By default, the menu items at the top level (level 0) are displayed in the static menu. 您可以藉由設定靜態功能表中顯示更多的功能表層級 （靜態子功能表）屬性。You can display additional menu levels (static submenus) within the static menu by setting the property. 功能表的項目 （如果有的話） 層級所指定的值高於屬性會顯示在動態子功能表。Menu items (if any) with a higher level than the value specified by the property are displayed in a dynamic submenu. 只有當使用者將滑鼠指標放在父功能表項目包含動態子功能表顯示動態子功能表。A dynamic submenu appears only when the user positions the mouse pointer over the parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 當使用者按一下功能表項目，控制項可以瀏覽到連結的網頁，或只是回傳給伺服器。When the user clicks a menu item, the control can either navigate to a linked Web page or simply post back to the server. 如果設定功能表項目的屬性，控制項巡覽至 [連結] 頁面; 否則回傳將頁面回傳至伺服器進行處理。If the property of a menu item is set, the control navigates to the linked page; otherwise, it posts the page back to the server for processing. 根據預設，連結的頁面會顯示在相同的視窗或框架做為控制項。By default, a linked page is displayed in the same window or frame as the control. 若要在不同的視窗或框架中顯示連結的內容，請使用屬性控制項。To display the linked content in a different window or frame, use the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會影響在控制項中的每個功能表項目。The property affects every menu item in the control. 若要指定的視窗或框架的個別功能表項目，設定屬性直接物件。To specify a window or frame for an individual menu item, set the property of the object directly. 每個功能表項目具有和屬性。Each menu item has a and a property. 值屬性會顯示在控制項，而屬性用來儲存功能表項目相關的任何其他資料，例如資料傳遞至功能表項目相關聯的回傳事件。The value of the property is displayed in the control, while the property is used to store any additional data about the menu item, such as data passed to the postback event associated with the menu item. 如果您設定屬性，但保留屬性未設定，屬性會自動設定相同的值與屬性。If you set the property, but leave the property unset, the property is automatically set with the same value as the property. 相反也是如此。The opposite is also true. 如果您設定屬性，而非屬性，屬性會自動設定相同的值與屬性。If you set the property, but not the property, the property is automatically set with the same value as the property. > [!NOTE] > 在相同的功能表層級的功能表項目都必須具有唯一值屬性;控制項無法區分不同的功能表項目相同層級有相同的值。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. 在此案例中，如果使用者按一下功能表項目具有重複的值，就會選取功能表中的第一個出現的功能表項目。In this scenario, if the user clicks a menu item that has a duplicate value, the menu item that appears first in the menu is selected. 若要顯示工具提示，使用者將滑鼠指標置於功能表項目時，請將設定項目的屬性。To display a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item, set the item's property. A控制項有許多不同類型的功能表項目。A control has several different types of menu items. 您可以使用下表中的屬性，來控制不同的功能表項目類型 （例如字型大小和色彩） 的樣式。You can control the style (such as font size and color) for the different menu item types by using the properties in the following table. |功能表項目樣式屬性Menu item style property|描述Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||當滑鼠指標位於動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||個別的動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||針對動態功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||目前已選取動態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||當滑鼠指標位於靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||個別靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||對於靜態功能表樣式設定。The style settings for a static menu.| ||目前選取之靜態功能表項目的樣式設定。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 而不是設定個別的樣式屬性，您可以指定套用至使用下表所示的樣式集合，根據其層級的功能表項目的樣式。Instead of setting the individual style properties, you can specify styles that are applied to menu items based on their level by using the style collections shown in the following table. |層級的樣式集合Level style collections|描述Description| |-----------------------------|-----------------| ||集合控制功能表項目的樣式的物件會根據其層級。A collection of objects that control the style of the menu items based on their level.| ||集合選取功能表項目根據其層級的控制項的樣式的物件。A collection of objects that control the style of selected menu items based on their level.| ||集合控制子功能表項目的樣式的物件會根據其層級。A collection of objects that control the style of the submenu items based on their level.| 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至功能表樹狀結構中，第一個層級的功能表項目的樣式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the first depth level in the menu tree. 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至功能表項目中的功能表樹狀目錄中，並依此類推，第二個層級的樣式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the second depth level in the menu tree, and so on. 這是最常用來產生內容樣式導覽功能表的資料表位於特定深度的功能表項目應該有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子功能表的位置。This is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用任何層級的樣式所列的集合上表中定義的樣式控制項，這些樣式設定會覆寫個別功能表項目的樣式屬性。If you use any of the level style collections listed in the previous table to define the style for the control, these style settings override the individual menu item style properties. 除了自訂功能表項目的樣式，您也可以自訂其外觀。In addition to customizing a menu item's style, you can also customize its appearance. 您可以藉由設定下列表格中的屬性指定的功能表項目不同的組件的自訂映像。You can specify custom images for the different parts for a menu item by setting the properties in the following table. |影像屬性Image property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||選擇性的影像，顯示的功能表項目文字旁。An optional image displayed next to the text of a menu item.| ||顯示的功能表項目，表示功能表項目具有動態子功能表中的選擇性影像。An optional image displayed in a menu item to indicate that the menu item has a dynamic submenu.| ||選擇性的影像，顯示在底部的功能表項目，將它與其他功能表項目分開。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a menu item to separate it from other menu items.| 若要判斷是否在目前選取的功能表項目控制，請使用屬性。To determine whether a menu item is currently selected in a control, use the property. 您也可以決定是否將功能表項目繫結至資料使用屬性。You can also determine whether a menu item is bound to data by using the property. 如果功能表項目繫結至資料，您可以使用屬性來存取資料項目的值繫結至功能表項目。If a menu item is bound to data, you can use the property to access the values of the data item bound to the menu item. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以填入控制具有靜態物件，使用宣告式語法。The following example demonstrates how to populate a control with static objects using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/CS/menuitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/VB/menuitemvb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何將繫結控制對控制項。The following example demonstrates how to bind a control to a control. 當繫結至資料來源控制項會自動建立物件。When bound to a data source, the control automatically creates the objects. 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Web.sitemap 檔案複製範例網站導覽資料如下。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data below to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/CS/menudatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/VB/menudatabindvb.aspx#1)] 以下是範例網站導覽資料上一個範例。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體不功能表文字或值的類別。Use this constructor to create a new instance of a class without menu text or a value. > [!NOTE] > 這個建構函式使用時中的所有屬性物件設定為其預設值。When this constructor is used, all properties in the object are set to their default values. 請務必設定這些屬性，有必要，請在建立物件之後。Be sure to set the properties, as necessary, after creating the object. 這個建構函式通常用於以動態方式填入的集合控制或的集合物件。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection of a control or the collection of a object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 物件會被用來以動態方式填入功能表項目在控制項。The object is then used to dynamically populate the menu items in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別使用的功能表文字、 值、 影像 URL，與所指定的瀏覽 URL `text`， `value`， `imageUrl`，和`navigateUrl`參數，分別。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the menu text, value, image URL, and navigation URL specified by the `text`, `value`, `imageUrl`, and `navigateUrl` parameters, respectively. 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`text` 參數的值。The value of the `text` parameter.| ||`value` 參數的值。The value of the `value` parameter.| ||`imageUrl` 參數的值。The value of the `imageUrl` parameter.| ||`navigateUrl` 參數的值。The value of the `navigateUrl` parameter.| 這個建構函式通常用於以動態方式填入的集合控制或的集合物件。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection of a control or the collection of a object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 物件會被用來以動態方式填入功能表項目在控制項。The object is then used to dynamically populate the menu items in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性 （集合） 來存取目前的功能表項目 子功能表項目，如果有的話。Use the property (collection) to access the submenu items of the current menu item, if any. 此集合包含只有在下一個層級的功能表項目。This collection contains only the menu items at the next level. 若要存取功能表項目進一步功能表樹狀結構，請使用後續的功能表項目的屬性。To access menu items further down the menu tree, use the property of a subsequent menu item. 如果屬性是`null`，目前的功能表中沒有任何子功能表項目。If the property is `null`, the current menu does not have any submenu items. 屬性也可用來以程式設計方式管理目前的功能表項目的子功能表項目。The property can also be used to programmatically manage the submenu items of the current menu item. 您加入、 插入、 移除、 擷取和修改從集合的物件。You can add, insert, remove, retrieve, and modify objects from the collection. 集合的任何更新將會自動反映在控制重新整理頁面，會在下一次。Any updates to the collection will automatically be reflected in the control the next time the page is refreshed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用中的屬性，以周遊的功能表項目控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to traverse the menu items in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能表項目可以是下列其中一種兩種模式： 選取模式或瀏覽模式。A menu item can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 根據預設，功能表項目處於選取模式。By default, a menu item is in selection mode. 若要置於瀏覽模式中的功能表項目，將設定功能表項目的屬性為空字串以外的值 ("")。To put a menu item into navigation mode, set the menu item's property to a value other than an empty string (""). 瀏覽模式中的功能表項目時，該功能表項目已停用所有的選取項目事件。When a menu item is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that menu item. 按一下 瀏覽模式中的功能表項目會將使用者帶至指定的 URL。Clicking the menu item in navigation mode takes the user to the specified URL. 您可以選擇性地設定屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，其中顯示連結的內容。You can optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要在使用者按一下功能表項目時，瀏覽至的 URL。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to navigate to when the user clicks a menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`false`功能表項目上採取任何動作發生於功能表項目按一下時 （選取）。When this property is set to `false` on a menu item, no action occurs when the menu item is clicked (selected). 指出功能表項目的子功能表項目，如果有一個快顯影像存在，仍然會顯示且可用。The pop-out image indicating child menu items for the menu item, if one exists, is still shown and available. 如果您不想要顯示功能表項目的任何子功能表項目，設定屬性設`false`。If you do not want any child menu items to appear for a menu item, set the property to `false`. 僅適用於可被選取，按一下功能表項目回傳方面的功能表項目，並設定該項目的選取狀態。 applies only to menu items that can be selected, in the sense that clicking a menu item posts back and sets that item in the selected state. 請注意，無法選取的功能表項目仍會格式化為連結。Note that a menu item that cannot be selected is still formatted as a link. 這是基於協助工具，讓功能表項目可能會導致發生的動作。This is for accessibility reasons, so that the menu item can cause an action to occur. 此外，功能表項目，即使它不能選取，可能會有子功能表項目可選取，或是需要顯示。Also, a menu item, even if it cannot be selected, may have child menu items that can be selected or that need to be displayed. 如果您想要防止使用者按下功能表項目，請執行下列其中一項動作：If you want to prevent a user from clicking a menu item, do one of the following: - 未設定並設定至`false`。Do not set and set to `false`. - 設定功能表項目的屬性設`false`。Set the menu item's property to `false`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用功能表項目屬性設定為`false`隨即出現，並在功能表中的函式。The following example demonstrates how a menu item with the property set to `false` appears and functions in a menu. span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用功能表項目時按下該功能表項目連結的屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，其中顯示 Web 內容。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. 除了以底線為開頭的某些特殊值以外，值必須以 A 到 Z (不區分大小寫) 範圍內的字母為開頭，如下表所示。Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. 請注意，設定這個屬性會覆寫屬性此功能表項目的控制項。Note that setting this property overrides the property of the control for this menu item. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 `_search` 目標值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會呈現為`target`屬性。The property is rendered as a `target` attribute. `target` XHTML 1.1 strict 文件類型定義中不允許在錨點項目上的屬性。The `target` attribute on anchor elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 strict document type definition. 未設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出，如必須是 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用功能表項目時按下該功能表項目連結的屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，其中顯示 Web 內容。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemTarget/CS/menuitemtargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemTarget/VB/menuitemtargetvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來補充儲存功能表項目相關聯的任何其他資料的屬性。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the menu item. 此值不會顯示在控制項，通常用來儲存資料，來處理回傳事件。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性包含`null`，則`get`存取子會傳回的值屬性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果屬性，依序包含`null`，會傳回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. 值屬性也會將值路徑中指定時產生屬性。The value of the property is also used when the value path specified in the property is generated. 值的路徑是以分隔符號隔開清單的功能表項目值構成從根功能表項目中的通往目前功能表項目。A value path is a delimiter-separated list of menu item values that forms a path from the root menu item to the current menu item. 將值路徑用來指示的位置中的功能表項目控制項。The value path is used to indicate the position of a menu item in a control. > [!NOTE] > 在相同的功能表層級的功能表項目都必須具有唯一值屬性;控制項無法區分不同的功能表項目相同層級有相同的值。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何顯示功能表項目和其父代，當使用者選取功能表項目。The following example demonstrates how to display the for a menu item and its parent when the user selects a menu item. summary.span: 取得從根功能表項目通往目前功能表項目的路徑。

span.span: Gets the path from the root menu item to the current menu item.

value.span: 將功能表項目值以分隔符號隔開的清單，構成從根功能表項目通往目前功能表項目的路徑。

span.span: A delimiter-separated list of menu item values that form a path from the root menu item to the current menu item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含構成從根功能表項目通往目前功能表項目的路徑的功能表項目值的分隔符號分隔清單。The property contains a delimiter-separated list of menu item values that form a path from the root menu item to the current menu item. 將值路徑用來指示的位置中的功能表項目控制項。The value path is used to indicate the position of a menu item in a control. 您可以指定用來分隔功能表項目值使用的分隔符號字元屬性。You can specify the delimiter character used to separate the menu item values by using the property. 這個值通常用於剖析為個別的值，或將做為引數的清單方法的類別。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values, or to pass as an argument to the method of the class. 在顯示的值而定控制項，分隔符號字元可能需要變更，以避免任何衝突。Depending on the value displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果您將分隔符號字元為逗號時，所顯示的值不應包含任何逗號;否則，您無法準確地剖析屬性。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed value should not contain any commas; otherwise, you cannot accurately parse the property. > [!NOTE] > 值從根功能表項目通往目前功能表項目的每個功能表項目的屬性會用來產生值的路徑。The values of the property of each menu item from the root menu item to the current menu item are used to generate the value path. 在相同的功能表層級的功能表項目都必須具有唯一值屬性;控制項無法區分不同的功能表項目相同層級有相同的值。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何剖析的值個別功能表項目值的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to parse the value to the property for the individual menu item values. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemValuePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemValuePath/CS/menuitemvaluepathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemValuePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemValuePath/VB/menuitemvaluepathvb.aspx#1)]
